author: Theron Mohamed
title: Why markets are weirdly calm after the US bombed Iran
description: Investors expected choppy markets on Monday after the US bombed Iran on the weekend, but trading was muted due to uncertainty, timing, and optimism.
content:
Investors were bracing for a wild day of trading on Monday after the US bombed Iran on Sunday, but world markets are surprisingly calm.
